hero.title: Rotary Club Tunis Doyen
hero.subtitle: Service Above Self - الخدمة فوق الذات
hero.description: Founded in 1929, we are Tunisia's first Rotary club. Together, we transform lives and strengthen our local and international communities.
hero.rotaryNetwork: Part of the Rotary International Network

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Meet Rotary Club Tunis Doyen
about.description: Rotary Club Tunis Doyen, founded in 1929, is proud to be Tunisia's first Rotary club. Our commitment to community service and international development makes us a cornerstone of Tunisian society.
about.missionText: To serve local and international communities through humanitarian, educational, and economic projects.

humanitarian.title: Humanitarian Service
humanitarian.description: We participate in international projects to combat disease and poverty

friendship.title: Friendship Links
friendship.description: We build lasting friendships between peoples and cultures

excellence.title: Local Excellence
excellence.description: We serve our local community and contribute to its development

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.description: Discover our upcoming events and community activities.

articles.title: Articles & News
articles.description: Stay informed about the latest news and activities in our club.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We are here to help you. Please don't hesitate to contact us with any questions or suggestions.

login.title: Login
login.description: Log in to your Rotary account

errors.rateLimit: Too many attempts. Please try again later.

request.title: Reset Password
request.description: Enter your email address to receive a reset link
request.success: If an account exists with this email, a reset link has been sent.

confirm.title: New Password
confirm.requirements: Password must contain at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters.

errors.weak: Password does not meet security requirements
errors.invalidToken: Reset link is invalid or expired
